## Main Figures
```{r}
defect_sumstats <- read_tsv("../sumstats/MC4R-DMS11-DefectSumstats.tsv")
rescue_sumstats <- read_tsv("../sumstats/MC4R-DMS11-RescueSumstats.tsv")

defect_rescue_stats <- inner_join(defect_sumstats %>% filter(chaperone == "NoIpsen"),
           rescue_sumstats,
           suffix = c("_defect", "_rescue"),
           by = c("chunk", "pos", "mut_aa")) %>%
    mutate(category = if_else(p.adj_defect < 0.05 & p.adj_rescue < 0.05,
                              "Joint Significant",
                              "Non-Joint Significant"))

sig_vars <- defect_rescue_stats %>%
    filter(category == "Joint Significant") %>%
    mutate(id = str_c(pos, mut_aa)) %>%
    dplyr::select(id) %>%
    unlist()
```

### Scaled (0-1) Rescue Effects Across All Variants
```{r scaled-rescue-scatter, fig.width=6, fig.height=6}
defect_sumstats %>%
    dplyr::select(chunk:log2FoldChange) %>%
    pivot_wider(names_from = chaperone, values_from = log2FoldChange) %>%
    ggplot() +
        geom_point(aes(x = 2^NoIpsen,
                       y = 2^Ipsen,
                       color = if_else(mut_aa == "X", "Stop", "NonStop")),
                   alpha = 0.3) +
        scale_color_manual(values = c("Stop" = "red",
                                      "NonStop" = "black"),
                           name = "") +
        coord_cartesian(xlim = c(0,1.5), ylim = c(0,3)) +
        xlab("Fold Change, Mutant NoIpsen vs WT NoIpsen") +
        ylab("Fold Change, Mutant Ipsen vs WT NoIpsen") +
        geom_abline(slope = 1, intercept = 0)
```

### Wang 2014 Variants
```{r rescue-wang2014-barplot, fig.width=12, fig.height=6}
wang2014 <- read_tsv("../data/annotations/MC4R-Wang2014.tsv")
wang2014_barplot_data <- defect_sumstats %>%
    dplyr::select(chunk:std.error) %>%
    inner_join(wang2014, by = join_by(pos, mut_aa)) %>%
    mutate(group = factor(group, levels = c("NoRescue",
                                            "WeakRescue",
                                            "StrongRescue")))

wang2014_barplot_data %>%
    mutate(chaperone = relevel(as.factor(chaperone), ref = "NoIpsen")) %>%
    ggplot() +
        geom_bar(aes(x = reorder(str_c(pos, mut_aa), pos),
                     y = 2^log2FoldChange,
                     fill = chaperone),
                 width = 0.5,
                 position = position_dodge(width = 0.5),
                 stat = "identity") +
        geom_errorbar(aes(x = reorder(str_c(pos, mut_aa), pos),
                     y = 2^log2FoldChange,
                     ymin = 2^(log2FoldChange-2*std.error),
                     ymax = 2^(log2FoldChange+2*std.error),
                     group = chaperone),
                 width = 0.2,
                 position = position_dodge(width = 0.5),
                 stat = "identity") +
        scale_fill_manual(values = c("Ipsen" = "red", "NoIpsen" = "gray")) +
        facet_grid(cols = vars(group), scales = "free_x", space = "free") +
        geom_hline(yintercept = 1)
```

```{r rescue-wang2014-scatter, fig.width=6, fig.height=6}
wang2014_vswt <- defect_sumstats %>%
    dplyr::select(chunk:log2FoldChange) %>%
    pivot_wider(names_from = chaperone, values_from = log2FoldChange) %>%
    inner_join(wang2014, by = join_by(pos, mut_aa))

defect_sumstats %>%
    dplyr::select(chunk:log2FoldChange) %>%
    pivot_wider(names_from = chaperone, values_from = log2FoldChange) %>%
    left_join(wang2014, by = join_by(pos, mut_aa)) %>%
    ggplot() +
        geom_point(aes(x = 2^NoIpsen,
                       y = 2^Ipsen),
                   alpha = 0.3) +
        geom_point(data = wang2014_vswt,
                   aes(x = 2^NoIpsen,
                       y = 2^Ipsen,
                       color = group),
                   size = 3) +
        geom_label_repel(data = wang2014_vswt,
               aes(x = 2^NoIpsen,
                   y = 2^Ipsen,
                   label = str_c(pos, mut_aa))) +
        scale_color_manual(values = c("StrongRescue" = "green",
                                      "WeakRescue" = "gold",
                                      "NoRescue" = "red"),
                           name = "Wang 2014") +
        coord_cartesian(xlim = c(0,1.5), ylim = c(0,3)) +
        xlab("Fold Change, Mutant NoIpsen vs WT NoIpsen") +
        ylab("Fold Change, Mutant Ipsen vs WT NoIpsen") 
```

## Extended Figures

### Rescue/Defect Effects Across All Variants
```{r rescue-defect-effects-scatter, fig.width=6, fig.height=6}
ggplot(defect_rescue_stats) +
    geom_point(aes(x = log2FoldChange_defect,
                   y = log2FoldChange_rescue,
                   color = category),
               alpha = 0.3) +
    geom_hline(yintercept = 0) +
    geom_vline(xintercept = 0) +
    scale_color_manual(values = c("Joint Significant" = "red",
                                  "Non-Joint Significant" = "black"),
                       name = "") +
    geom_abline(intercept = 0, slope = -1) +
    coord_cartesian(xlim = c(-2,1), ylim = c(-2,2.5)) +
    xlab("Defect Log2FoldChange") +
    ylab("Rescue Log2FoldChange") 
```
